import pandas as pd

def max_elements_by_index(a, index):
    df = pd.DataFrame({'': a, 'index': index})
    return df.groupby('index')['a'].max().values

import pandas as pd

def max_elements_by_index(a, index):
    df = pd.DataFrame({'a': a, '': index})
    return df.groupby('index')['a'].max().values

import pandas as pd

def max_elements_by_index(a, index):
    df = pd.DataFrame({'a': a, 'index': index})
    return df.groupby('index')[''].max().values

import pandas as pd

def max_elements_by_index(a, index):
    df = pd.DataFrame({'a': a, 'index': index})
    return df.groupby('')['a'].max().values
